title: 3DTILES_metadata 3D Tiles extension
description: 3D Tiles extension that defines metadata for a tileset.

classes.description: A dictionary, where each key is a class ID and each value is an object defining the class.

enums.description: A dictionary, where each key is an enum ID and each value is an object defining the values for the enum.

statistics.description: An object containing statistics about the metadata.

groups.description: A dictionary, where each key is a group ID and each value is an object defining the group.

tileset.description: An object containing metadata about a tileset.
